synopsis.text: Tsukino Talent Productions brings together twelve extraordinary idols, forming two daring music groups, VAZZY and ROCK DOWN, who join forces to create the ultimate ensemble, VAZZROCK. Led by Takaaki Mamiya and Shou Onoda, these talented individuals strive to outshine one another while simultaneously fostering deep friendships. As they gear up for their four-year-anniversary concert, VAZZROCK Live Flawless, the idols dedicate themselves to honing their skills through additional dance and singing lessons, as well as starring in a captivating TV period drama. With a shared goal of delivering an unforgettable performance for their fans, these unique stars push each other to new heights, blending rivalry and camaraderie in their quest to shine brighter than ever before.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
